name: Dragon Hunt (itch)
description:
You are a Dragon on the hunt for your lunch. When you find your next meal, some Phoenix Eggs, another Dragon begins to approach. Not much to do than to Fight.

Choose Your Fighter:

The Ice Dragon of the West: WASD for movement and F for Firing your Icy Cold FrostFire.

Or

The Fire Dragon of the East: Arrow Keys for Movement and the (/) Button for Firing your Flaming Hot Ember.
